thought: I will implement the params for the folder search action to find 'ProAgentWorkspace'.
plan: Set searchMethod to 'name' to search by folder name
Set returnAll to false to limit results
Set limit to 1 to get only one folder
Set filter to type 'folder' to ensure searching folders only
criticism: The plan assumes the folder name is unique and only one folder will be returned. If multiple folders exist with the same name, this may cause issues.

tool_input.comments: Search for the folder 'ProAgentWorkspace' by name in Google Drive with filter for folder mime type
TODO: Handle multiple folders with the same name if needed

tool_output.error: Undefined property "mimeType" for params["filter"], supported properties: ['driveId', 'folderId', 'whatToSearch', 'includeTrashed']
